Description.Name: Kraken Good Time
Description.Details: You are on the bridge when Sumire calls out, "Commander, we have an incoming holovid transmission." You motion to Sumire to accept the transmission, "Greetings, Commander {COMMANDER.LastName}. Nice to see you again, I trust things have been well?" You cross your arms in front of you, "What do you want this time Front Man?" Front Man smiles, "You realy should have someone properly vet your crew. You have another in your employ that owes us money. You know them as [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and they owe us more than ¢1,000,000. Allow [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] to participate in the Game and we can put this matter behind us all. Or you can buyout their marker like you did last time we were in this predicament." You look at the screen, "So I am to just take your word that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] owes you this money? How do I know that you are not just trying to extort my company?" Front Man looks at you, "Commander, you have resources to check up on each and every one of your crew. In fact, you already know that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] has a criminal background, yet you chose to hire them anyways, and now here we are, again." You start to respond but Front Man continues speaking, "I present the same offer I did last time. You may choose to decline the invitation, in which case we will implement whatever means necessary to either recoup our money from [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], or... well, we wouldn't want to spoil the surprise now would we?" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] turns to you, "Commander, I told you they would keep looking for me. If they are still willing to wipe my debt AND reward us at the same time, I am all in!" You address Front Man, "So, your proposal is EXACTLY the same as last time we spoke? Repeat it to me now." Front Man steeples his fingers in front of him, "Absolutely. My employer asks that [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] plays in a game. Winning the game will result in {SCN_MW.DET} debt being wiped and your company will receive a crate of 'goodies'. Should [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] fail in achieving victory, their debt will be paid in a more permanent manner. You can also opt to buyout their marker as well." "What is your decision, Commander?" says Front Man.

Description.Name: politely dismiss Front Man
Description.Details: You address Front Man, "You were told last time that we are not interested. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] continues to remain in my employ and you can sort it out at the end of their contract." Front Man looks at you with displeasure, "This is a most unfortunate, Commander. We had hoped with time you would rethink our proposal. Know this, we will get our money from [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], with interest, and your company may end up as collateral damage as well." A smirk crosses your face, "Feels like deju vu." Front Man, smiles at you, "We shall see, Commander. We shall see." The image on the holocom winks out. Darius looks concerned, "Commander, he found us yet again. Is this the right course of action?" "Darius," you state calmly, "They threatened us before, and nothing has happened. They are all bluster. Think nothing more of it." Even then, you still wonder if you have heard the last from Front Man

Description.Name: Participate
Description.Details: You turn to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "Are you sure you want to do this? It sounds VERY risky and dangerous, possibly even fatal." [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] looks you in the eye, full of confidence, "Commander, I know I can do this. My gambling habits and put me here, and there is no way I can earn the C-Bills to pay them off. I will win this and erase my debt once and for all." "Very well then." You spin around to address Front Man, "Okay, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] agrees to particapte in your 'game'. Where are we headed to?" Front Man smiles, "My dear Commander, 'We' are not going anywhere, only [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is leaving for the arena. The dropship Moirai is approaching even as we speak. Please allow it to dock with the Argo. Only [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] is allowed through the airlock onto the Moirai and anyone else caught trying to get on board will be dealt with severely." "And how will we know whether [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] passes your challenge?" you ask. "[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] will return to you when the games are finished. Along with the applicable bonuses mentioned before," states Front Man at which point the holocom goes dark. With a nod of {SCN_MW.DET} head, [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] heads off down the corridor to board the Moirai. You sincerely hope you get to see {SCN_MW.DET} alive and well soon.

Description.Name: Buyout Marker
Description.Details: You look Front Man directly in the face, "How much?" Front Man looks intrigued, "How much for what, my dear Commander?" "How much to buy [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s marker? No strings, no further obligations," you state succinctly. Front Man steeples his fingers, "You would be willing to bail [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] out of the hole they dug themselves into? Interesting... very well, if you wish to end this here an now it will cost you ¢1,161,380. My assistant has just sent you the account details." You turn to Darius, "Make the transfer." Darius types in some information into the console, then nods, "Transfer complete Commander." Front Man looks away for a minute before turning back to you, "The deal is done, Commander. You are an interesting one, I do so hope we meet again!" As you kill the connection, you state, "The feeling is NOT mutual." The holocom connection closes. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] rushes over and grabs your hand, "Thank you! I... I do not know what to say!" You smile at [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], "Just do your job and be the best MechWarrior you can. Oh, and no more gambling!" [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] cannot keep the smile of {SCN_MW.OBJ} face, "Absolutely Commander!"
